nodes.text: "The Treasure of Celis Mott" is a mini four-part roleplaying game adventure that appears in Instant Adventures, published by West End Games in December 1996 and written by Timothy S. O'Brien.

A group of spacers are found by an old friend, Marka Durn, who dies in front of them after being shot by pirates. They go to his ship and discover coordinates to the treasure of the pirate Celis Mott. Along the way they are entangled
